metaDescription.content: Learn which features and limits are available on the Free, Pro, Guru, and Business subscription plans.

Knowledge Base
Subscriptions
Subscription Limits

Subscription Limits

Knowing everything about what you purchase is very important to make full use of the product. You wouldn’t want to buy a car without knowing all of the features it offers and how they work, right? The same goes for your Semrush account.

Please note: to check how much of your limits you've used throughout the month, you can go to the Subscription Info page under the account profile menu.

Follow these articles for information on the limits of each area of Semrush.

Domain & Keyword Analytics

This is the starting point of any online marketing activity—who your organic and paid competitors are, how well their websites perform, and which keywords are at play.

Within our reports, in just a few clicks, you will get the right keywords for your campaigns, uncover your competitors, and gather all the analytical data you’ll need.

The first big difference between the subscription plans for Domain Analytics and Keyword Analytics is the limits for the number of Requests per day and the number of Results per request.

 

Plans & Prices

A Request serves as a search. If you typed in a domain and were redirected to the Domain Overview, that would be one request.

However, clicking on the traffic number listed under Organic Search from the Domain Overview would be the second request. Each time you go to a different report within Semrush, that counts as an additional request.

Results are what show up for your query. For example, if you go to the Organic Positions report for a domain, each keyword would count as a result. The same goes for the exports; you would be limited to the number of results available for your subscription plan.

Historical Data
Historical data in all our analytical reports is only available to our Guru-level users or higher. Historical data lets you see past data on any query you enter within Semrush. Our database goes back as far as January 2012. Pro users will only be able to see our live data.
Semrush .Trends

You can purchase Semrush .Trends as an add-on for a paid Semrush subscription (or as part of a custom Semrush plan) for $289/month.

.Trends subscription gives you access to Traffic Analytics, Market Explorer, EyeOn, and One2Target tools. With these tools, you can benchmark and compare multiple websites’ performance, traffic, and user engagement, monitor trends, conduct awesome presale research, and more.

Please note that daily and weekly competitive traffic data is only available to users of the new .Trends plan.

The 3 sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, weather.com) allow you to see the features and reports of the Semrush .Trends solution in action before deciding to add full access to your subscription.

Plans & Prices

Access to Traffic Analytics data based on your subscription is as follows:

  • Free subscription without Semrush .Trends: Limited access to the Overview report (free accounts can make 10 total requests/day between all Semrush reports), and all remaining reports can be viewed using our 3 sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, and weather.com).

  • Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Ability to enter queries into the Overview report. All remaining reports can be tested using our 3 sample domains. The number of results in all Traffic Analytics reports is limited to 10.

  • Paid subscription with the .Trends solution: Complete access to all Traffic Analytics data, reports, and features. This includes:

    • Traffic Overview

    • Audience Overview

    • Traffic Journey

    • Top Pages

    • Subfolders

    • Subdomains

    • Geo Distribution

    • Bulk Analysis

Access to Market Explorer data based on your subscription is as follows:

Free subscription without Semrush .Trends: Limited access to the Overview report (free accounts can make 10 total requests/day between all Semrush reports). Worldwide level only. No historical data.

Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Ability to enter queries into the Overview and Demographics reports. All remaining reports can be tested using our 3 sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, and weather.com). Worldwide level only. No access to historical data.

Paid subscription with the Semrush .Trends solution: Complete access to all Market Explorer data, reports, and features. This includes:

  • Traffic Sources filters 

  • Market Traffic graph 

  • Trending keywords widget

  • Benchmarking report

  • All domains report

Access to EyeOn data based on your subscription is as follows:

Free and Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Option to create one list containing up to 5 domains. You are limited to 100 requests per 24 hours; no data can be exported. Access to the Social Media report is limited (only Posts and Posts per day numbers). Historical data is limited to the last 3 months. 

Paid subscription with the Semrush .Trends solution: you can create up to 20 lists, each containing 5 domains max. The 24-hour limit of available requests is 3000 on Pro level, 5000 on Guru, and 10000 on Business. All data can be exported to CSV and Google Sheets. Full access to the Social Media report is provided.

Access to One2Target data based on your subscription is as follows:

Free and Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Limited access to all reports; data is provided only for several sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, and weather.com)

Paid subscription with the Semrush .Trends solution: Full access to the tool, the option to research any website, and filter the results by country, device, or specific month. Option to create lists from scratch or import from EyeOn or Market Explorer.

.Trends add-on also offers you its very own API.

Number of Projects

Some of the major Semrush tools require a preset project. All tools within a single project are focused on the same domain. This way, you are able to keep track of your progress.

Our Projects section serves as a valuable resource for any digital marketer. Through various tools offered within the Projects interface, users can find powerful information to effectively structure their digital marketing campaigns.
Based on your subscription level, you are only allowed a certain number of Projects:

Plans & Prices

Share projects with your colleagues for dynamic and transparent cooperation.

You can always delete a project to free up space for a new one, but keep in mind that you will lose all of the previously collected data.

Site Audit: Pages to Crawl
The number of pages your Site Audit can crawl throughout all of your projects is limited by your account. Each package comes with a total number of pages that a user can crawl per month. Here are the limits by subscription:

Plans & Prices

The Maximum number of pages that can be crawled in a single audit:

  • Free: 100
  • Pro: 20,000
  • Guru: 20,000
  • Business: 100,000

Pages to crawl do not roll over each month; however, they reset on the 1st of the month.

Once you use up your total amount for the month, you would either need to wait until next month for your limits to be reset, expand your limits, or upgrade your account to receive more pages. When conducting your Site Audit campaigns, you will want to keep this in mind so you don’t waste your limits.

Site Audit: AMP Checks

Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) is a Google-backed technology designed to improve the performance of mobile websites. An AMP version of a website loads three times faster from the search engine than a non-AMP version, but it places strict restrictions on CSS, Javascript, and HTML usage. Mistakes during AMP implementation are very common, so Semrush Site Audit offers to check the websites of our Business subscribers for over 40 AMP-related issues.

Since page load speed has a great influence on user experience and is a ranking factor for Google, you can see why AMP has become an important platform for e-commerce and advertising.

Position Tracking
Just like the other tools within our Projects interface, our Position Tracking tool also has subscription limitations. These limitations come in the form of keywords:

Plans & Prices

You will also want to keep these limits in mind when reporting. If you ever run out of keywords, you can always remove individual keywords, remove any projects, buy more keywords, or upgrade your account.

Cannibalization Report is included in the Guru or higher subscription plans. It allows you to detect the pages that compete for the same keywords and search rankings and lose positions due to this competition.

Multi-targeting is available to our users with a Guru or higher subscription plan and allows users to gather rank-tracking data for multiple devices and locations simultaneously within the same project (for example, Desktop vs. Mobile).

Please note: When you add another location or device to your campaign, your account is charged separately for the keywords in the second location.

So, a Project tracking the same 10 keywords in 3 different locations costs 30 keywords from your account limits.

On Page SEO Checker
On Page SEO Checker allows you to pair landing pages with sets of keywords to get recommendations for search engine optimization.

Plans & Prices

If you want optimization ideas for 100 keywords 10 times a month, you will be spending 1,000 SEO ideas units. Your limit refreshes each month on the 1st of the month.

Please keep in mind that this tool shares its limit of keywords (labeled as SEO Ideas units on your Subscription Info page) with SEO Writing Assistant and SEO Content Template. Every target keyword you enter into one of those tools will also count against the same pool of limits (10 for a Free account, 500 for a Pro account, and so on). More info on SEO Ideas units can be found here. 

Semrush Social
If you work with social media, you must know how hard it can be to track and analyze the results of your activities while also keeping an eye on all your competitors. Another big and time-consuming part of a social media specialist’s workflow is managing accounts, scheduling, and posting to different social networks.

To relieve you from these issues, Semrush designed a special App – Semrush Social that consists of four tools:
  • Tracker that allows you to track the social media accounts of your closest competitors and compare their growth and engagement levels to yours. 
  • Poster that offers an easy way to draft, schedule, and post content on Facebook (Business pages), LinkedIn, Instagram, Google Business Profile, Pinterest, and Twitter without leaving the Semrush interface.
  • Analytics that allows you to see your internal analytic metrics for your Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram channels. 
  • Content Insights is a simple dashboard that shows key stats about your social media performance. You can see the number of posts, engagement metrics (likes, comments, etc.), and best-performing tags/content types for your selected date range.

Semrush Social is available for an additional $29.99/month, and the limits in each tool will depend on the level of your subscription:

 

 Social Subscription

  Pro subscription Guru subscription Business subscription
Projects 1 5 15 40
Poster limits*

10

owned social profiles to post

10

owned social profiles to post

30

owned social profiles to post

50

owned social profiles to post
Tracker limits

50

social profiles to track

50

social profiles to track

100

social profiles to track

300

social profiles to track

*Additional features for Poster are:

  • UTM builder
  • Bitly Shortener
  • Giphy
  • RSS feeds
  • Image Editor
  • Bulk Scheduling
  • Video posting (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn)

Supported channels for Poster: 

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Twitter
  • LinkedIn
  • Pinterest

Supported channels for Tracker:

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Twitter
  • YouTube 
  • Pinterest

Projects refer to the number of campaigns you create: 1 project – 1 website to post and/or track competitors for.

Owned social profiles are the social accounts you can connect to Semrush in order to post across different social networks from a single tab. 

For example, let’s say you have three Projects with Social Poster running, and in each Project, you have Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest connected for posting. This would cost you nine profiles (three connected profiles in three Projects). 

Social profiles to track are the profiles of your brand and your competitors you are tracking within your Tracker Project.

Let's say you have created a Social Tracker project in which you are only tracking Facebook and Twitter. If you were to add two competitors who both have Facebook and Twitter, you would have used up six profiles. 

Each competitor would have two profiles, along with the two profiles you added for your own domain, to give you a total of six profiles.

In addition to Semrush Social subscription, you can purchase Social Content AI for $29.99/month. 

Social Content AI is an AI-powered tool that generates strong content ideas across a variety of topics and helps create that content for specific social media networks. With this tool, you can effortlessly brainstorm ideas, generate your post with your unique visuals, and plan your content in minutes.

Content Marketing Platform

Semrush offers multiple tools for content marketing. In addition to optimizing your content and tracking its performance, you can use SEO Content Template for creating SEO-friendly content from scratch. 

*Note: all tools in our Content Marketing Platform are only available in full with a Guru or Business level subscription*

 

Free

Pro

Guru

Business

Topic Research

2 queries 

2 queries

unlimited 

unlimited

SEO Ideas Units*

10

500

800

2000

SEO Content Template

(uses SEO Ideas Units)

1 template, 10 keywords per template max

1 template, 30 keywords per template max

unlimited templates, 30 keywords per template max

unlimited templates, 30 keywords per template max

SEO Writing Assistant

2 documents for a lifetime of your account, SEO and Readability checks


 

2 documents, SEO, Readability and Tone of Voice checks,  3 Plagiarism checks, 500 Smart Writer Words for a lifetime of your account

unlimited number of documents, SEO, Readability and Tone of Voice checks, 5 Plagiarism checks, 1000 Smart Writer Words per month

unlimited number of documents, SEO, Readability and Tone of Voice checks, 10 Plagiarism checks, 2000 Smart Writer Words per month


*SEO Ideas Units are distributed between SEO Content Template and On Page SEO Checker. 1 unit = 1 keyword you can add to a content template or On Page SEO Checker campaign.

More info on SEO Ideas units can be found here. 

Topic Research is a smart tool for content ideation in a creative and informed way, but please note that Free users and users on Pro will only be able to use it twice. Guru and Business users have unlimited access to topics. 

SEO Content Template analyzes your top competitors for your target keywords and provides you with recommendations for creating winning content. While with a Free you can create 1 template with 10 keywords, Pro accounts are upgraded slightly with 1 template with 30 keywords.

On a Guru and Business, you get unlimited templates with 30 keywords per template. However, each account level takes these keywords from your SEO Ideas limits. This means that the maximum possible number of keywords on Free is 10, Pro 500, Guru is 800, and on Business it's 2,000. 

SEO Writing Assistant is a Google Docs and MS Word add-on that integrates recommendations in your Google Docs or MS Word (it also functions as a WordPress plugin). With a Free account, you get 2 documents, SEO and Readability checks. With a Pro subscription, you also get 2 documents, as well as SEO, Readability, and Tone of Voice checks, 3 plagiarism checks, and 500 Smart Writer Words for a Rephraser feature. Guru and Business give you an unlimited number of documents, SEO, Readability, and Tone of Voice checks, additional plagiarism checks (5 and 10), and a Rephraser feature with 1000 and 2000 Smart Writer Words respectively per month.

Plans & Prices

PPC Keyword Tool
PPC Keyword Tool makes the job of a PPC specialist much easier by simplifying the planning and setting up of Google Ads campaigns. With this tool, you can organize keywords into ad groups and campaigns, receive local volume and CPC data, quickly set up negative keywords, and export a campaign plan to import directly into Google Ads.

The number of keywords you can export with CPC and volume data is limited by your subscription:

Please note: you can export as many keywords as you have in a PPC Keyword Tool campaign. However, you will only be able to export CPC and volume data for the amount available with your plan. For example, a Pro account could export a PPC Keyword Tool list with 600 keywords, but only the first 500 (based on campaign and alphabetical order) would have CPC and Volume data. The remaining 100 would just be exported as keywords without any further metrics.

Plans & Prices

Keyword Magic Tool
The Keyword Magic Tool is the most powerful keyword research tool on Semrush. Keyword Magic is wonderful for exploring different niche topics, finding useful long-tail keywords, and streamlining your keyword research process.

The limits for the Keyword Magic Tool are as follows:

Reports per day

  • Free - 10

  • Pro - 3000

  • Guru - 5000

  • Business - 10000

Results per report

  • Free - 10 in the user interface, 0 in export

  • Pro - 10000

  • Guru - 30000

  • Business - 50000

Reports per hour

  • Free - 10 per hour

  • Pro - 100

  • Guru - 100

  • Business - 100

Number of total keywords you can add to Keyword Strategy Builder in all of your lists:

  • All subscriptions: 100,000 keywords

Number of times you can cluster a list in Keyword Strategy Builder per month:

  • Free - 0 times
  • Pro - 10 times
  • Guru - 30 times
  • Business - 50 times

Keyword Strategy Builder (Refresh Keywords per month)

  • Free - 0

  • Pro - 250

  • Guru - 1000

  • Business - 5000

List sharing limits:

  • All paid users can share lists with Editor access with other paid users.
  • All paid users can share lists with Viewer access with all users (including Free users).
  • Free users cannot share Keyword Strategy Builder Lists.
PDF Reports (Scheduled and Branded)
The PDF limitations within your Semrush account refer to your capabilities within the My Reports section. Every account has the ability to create as many PDF reports as they wish. However, depending on your account, you can only schedule a number of reports.

Here are the limitations for scheduling your reports by package:

Semrush also offers extended branding and customization options for your reports as part of the Agency Growth Kit add-on, such as:

  • Branded reports: reports with a header that include both a logo and a brief description of your brand instead of the standard Semrush logo in the header.
  • White-labeled reports: The “The report data taken from semrush.com” phrase will be removed, Semrush will not be marked as a sender, and you will be able to customize the email text when scheduling or sending the report.
  • Custom themes: a set of backgrounds for your reports.
  • Custom visual styles: various color schemes and font sets to choose from.

Plans & Prices

Product Listing Ads (PLA) Research

Product Listing Ads (PLA) are displayed when someone searches on Google for a product that has a listing on Google Shopping. This type of ad is more intent-oriented and has a much higher conversion rate than the regular ad snippets. Therefore, serious e-commerce should pay close attention to the PLAs.

With a Free, Pro, or Guru account, you will be limited to only 10 rows of results when you query a report in this tool.

With a Business account, you will have full access to PLA Research reports. These reports include a PLA Positions report, Competitors report, and Copies report (for seeing your competitors’ actual PLAs).

API Access

Application Programming Interface (API) is a way of receiving raw Semrush data without navigating into Semrush itself.

The Standard API includes Analytics API and Projects API (Site Audit and Position Tracking data). This feature is only available to our Business subscribers.

Semrush users can also access the .Trends API (Basic or Premium) that allows to pull the data for up to 5 domains in a single request. 

  • .Trends Basic API:  Offers access to broad traffic summaries that include website traffic metrics and user behavior data
  • .Trends Premium API: Offers everything included in the .Trends Basic API, along with 16 additional data types that allow you to dig deeper into market dynamics, competitor strategies, and web traffic flows 

If you would like to know more about the pricing of API access/API units, we suggest referring to this article or reaching out to our sales team.

Agency Growth Kit

Access to any Agency Growth Kit add-on can be added to paid Semrush subscription plans.

 

Semrush Pro ($139.95/mo)

 Semrush Guru ($249.95/mo) Semrush Business ($499.95/mo)
AGK Start ($69/mo) ✔️ $208.95/mo ❌ ❌
AGK Scale ($149/mo) ✔️ $288.95/mo ✔️ $398.95/mo ❌
AGK Advanced ($249/mo) ✔️ $388.95/mo ✔️ $498.95/mo ✔️ $748.95/mo

Any Agency Growth Kit plan lets you:

  • Create white-label and branded reports (the number of available reports depends on your subscription);
  • Use themes for reports and customize their visual style;
  • Create client profiles in the CRM;
  • Create interactive and secure portals in Client Portal;
  • Get an Agency Partners Platform listing and Semrush Partner status after being certified as a Semrush Agency Partner.

Check your limits on your Subscription Info page. If you are interested in extending your subscription, you can reach out to sales@semrush.com.

By understanding your account's features and capabilities, you will have a stronger hold on the data we offer. You can use Semrush for free with limited functionality or use a free 7-day trial to test out the tools. The platform will automatically offer the trial to you, but if you would like to use Semrush for free or save it for later, you can skip this step:

Alternatively, you can choose one of the three main plans from the start: Pro, Guru, and Business. Please find the pricing for each plan here. 

If none of these plans fits your marketing needs, contact us to create a flexible custom plan. 

Semrush
Is this article helpful?

Subscription Limits

Knowing everything about what you purchase is very important to make full use of the product. You wouldn’t want to buy a car without knowing all of the features it offers and how they work, right? The same goes for your Semrush account.

Please note: to check how much of your limits you've used throughout the month, you can go to the Subscription Info page under the account profile menu.

Follow these articles for information on the limits of each area of Semrush.

Domain & Keyword Analytics
Historical Data
Semrush .Trends
Number of Projects
Site Audit: Pages to Crawl
Site Audit: AMP Checks
Position Tracking

Semrush Social
Content Marketing Platform
PPC Keyword Tool
Keyword Magic Tool
PDF Reports (Scheduled and Branded)
Product Listing Ads (PLA) Research
API Access
Agency Growth Kit
Try Semrush for free

Check your limits on your Subscription Info page. If you are interested in extending your subscription, you can reach out to sales@semrush.com.

By understanding your account's features and capabilities, you will have a stronger hold on the data we offer. You can use Semrush for free with limited functionality or use a free 7-day trial to test out the tools. The platform will automatically offer the trial to you, but if you would like to use Semrush for free or save it for later, you can skip this step:

Alternatively, you can choose one of the three main plans from the start: Pro, Guru, and Business. Please find the pricing for each plan here. 

If none of these plans fits your marketing needs, contact us to create a flexible custom plan.

images.alt: Semrush Domain Analytics and Keyword Analytics: requests and results. Free plan: no filters available, 10 results per request, 10 requests a day. Pro plan: 10000 results per request, 3000 requests a day. Guru plan: historical data, 30000 results per request, 5000 requests a day. Business plan: historical data, PLA, 50000 results per request, 10000 requests a day.
Semrush subscription without .Trends requests per day. Free plans: 10 requests per day. Pro plans: 3000 requests per day. Guru plans: 5000 requests per day. Business plans: 10000 requests per day.
Semrush subscription with .Trends requests per day. Pro plans: 3000 requests per day. Guru plans: 5000 requests per day. Business plans: 10000 requests per day.

Project limits in Semrush. Free plan: No sharing for edit, 1 Project. Pro plan: 5 Projects at a time. Guru plan: multi-targeting in Position Tracking, 15 Projects at a time. Business plan: multi-targeting in Position Tracking, AMP checks in Site Audit, 40 Projects at a time.
Site Audit Pages to Crawl limits. Free plan: 100 pages per month. Pro plan: 100,000 pages per month. Guru plan: 300,000 pages per month. Business plan: 1,000,000 pages per month and AMP checks.

Semrush Position Tracking: keywords to track limits. Free plan: 10 keywords in 1 Project. Pro plan: 500 keywords amongst your 5 Projects. Guru: 1500 keywords amongst 15 Projects. Business plan: 5000 keywords amongst 40 Projects.
Semrush On Page SEO Checker. Free plan: single use, 10 keywords. Pro plan: 500 keywords per month. Guru: 800 keywords per month. Business plan: 2000 keywords per month.

Semrush PPC Keyword Tool: export limits. Free plan: No CPC or volume data. Pro plan: 500 keywords with CPC and volume data. Guru plan: 1500 keywords with CPC and volume data. Business plan: 6000 keywords with CPC and volume data.
Semrush Keyword Magic Tool limits: reports per day. Free plan - 10, Pro - 3000, Guru - 5000, Business - 10000.
Semrush Keyword Magic Tool limits: Results per report. Free - 10 in the user interface, 0 in export, Pro - 10000, Guru - 30000, Business - 50000.
Scheduled PDF Reports. Free plan: 1 report. Pro plan: 5 reports. Guru plan: 20 reports. Business plan: 50 reports.
7-day trial pop-up showing Pro and Guru subscriptions.

structuredData.name: Semrush
structuredData.description: Semrush - online visibility management and content marketing SaaS platform

ogTags.og:title: Semrush Subscription Limits Comparison
ogTags.og:description: Learn which features and limits are available on the Free, Pro, Guru, and Business subscription plans.

properties.name: articleBody
properties.content:
Knowing everything about what you purchase is very important to make full use of the product. You wouldn’t want to buy a car without knowing all of the features it offers and how they work, right? The same goes for your Semrush account.

Please note: to check how much of your limits you've used throughout the month, you can go to the Subscription Info page under the account profile menu.

Follow these articles for information on the limits of each area of Semrush.


Domain & Keyword Analytics


This is the starting point of any online marketing activity—who your organic and paid competitors are, how well their websites perform, and which keywords are at play.

Within our reports, in just a few clicks, you will get the right keywords for your campaigns, uncover your competitors, and gather all the analytical data you’ll need.

The first big difference between the subscription plans for Domain Analytics and Keyword Analytics is the limits for the number of Requests per day and the number of Results per request.



 

Plans & Prices

A Request serves as a search. If you typed in a domain and were redirected to the Domain Overview, that would be one request.

However, clicking on the traffic number listed under Organic Search from the Domain Overview would be the second request. Each time you go to a different report within Semrush, that counts as an additional request.

Results are what show up for your query. For example, if you go to the Organic Positions report for a domain, each keyword would count as a result. The same goes for the exports; you would be limited to the number of results available for your subscription plan.




Historical Data

Historical data in all our analytical reports is only available to our Guru-level users or higher. Historical data lets you see past data on any query you enter within Semrush. Our database goes back as far as January 2012. Pro users will only be able to see our live data.



Semrush .Trends


You can purchase Semrush .Trends as an add-on for a paid Semrush subscription (or as part of a custom Semrush plan) for $289/month.

.Trends subscription gives you access to Traffic Analytics, Market Explorer, EyeOn, and One2Target tools. With these tools, you can benchmark and compare multiple websites’ performance, traffic, and user engagement, monitor trends, conduct awesome presale research, and more.

Please note that daily and weekly competitive traffic data is only available to users of the new .Trends plan.

The 3 sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, weather.com) allow you to see the features and reports of the Semrush .Trends solution in action before deciding to add full access to your subscription.





Plans & Prices

Access to Traffic Analytics data based on your subscription is as follows:


	
	Free subscription without Semrush .Trends: Limited access to the Overview report (free accounts can make 10 total requests/day between all Semrush reports), and all remaining reports can be viewed using our 3 sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, and weather.com).
	
	
	Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Ability to enter queries into the Overview report. All remaining reports can be tested using our 3 sample domains. The number of results in all Traffic Analytics reports is limited to 10.
	
	
	Paid subscription with the .Trends solution: Complete access to all Traffic Analytics data, reports, and features. This includes:

	
		
		Traffic Overview
		
		
		Audience Overview
		
		
		Traffic Journey
		
		
		Top Pages
		
		
		Subfolders
		
		
		Subdomains
		
		
		Geo Distribution
		
		
		Bulk Analysis
		
	
	

Access to Market Explorer data based on your subscription is as follows:

Free subscription without Semrush .Trends: Limited access to the Overview report (free accounts can make 10 total requests/day between all Semrush reports). Worldwide level only. No historical data.

Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Ability to enter queries into the Overview and Demographics reports. All remaining reports can be tested using our 3 sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, and weather.com). Worldwide level only. No access to historical data.

Paid subscription with the Semrush .Trends solution: Complete access to all Market Explorer data, reports, and features. This includes:


	
	Traffic Sources filters 
	
	
	Market Traffic graph 
	
	
	Trending keywords widget
	
	
	Benchmarking report
	
	
	All domains report
	


Access to EyeOn data based on your subscription is as follows:

Free and Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Option to create one list containing up to 5 domains. You are limited to 100 requests per 24 hours; no data can be exported. Access to the Social Media report is limited (only Posts and Posts per day numbers). Historical data is limited to the last 3 months. 

Paid subscription with the Semrush .Trends solution: you can create up to 20 lists, each containing 5 domains max. The 24-hour limit of available requests is 3000 on Pro level, 5000 on Guru, and 10000 on Business. All data can be exported to CSV and Google Sheets. Full access to the Social Media report is provided.

Access to One2Target data based on your subscription is as follows:

Free and Paid subscription without Semrush .Trends: Limited access to all reports; data is provided only for several sample domains (amazon.com, linkedin.com, and weather.com)

Paid subscription with the Semrush .Trends solution: Full access to the tool, the option to research any website, and filter the results by country, device, or specific month. Option to create lists from scratch or import from EyeOn or Market Explorer.

.Trends add-on also offers you its very own API.




Number of Projects


Some of the major Semrush tools require a preset project. All tools within a single project are focused on the same domain. This way, you are able to keep track of your progress.

Our Projects section serves as a valuable resource for any digital marketer. Through various tools offered within the Projects interface, users can find powerful information to effectively structure their digital marketing campaigns.
Based on your subscription level, you are only allowed a certain number of Projects:



Plans & Prices

Share projects with your colleagues for dynamic and transparent cooperation.

You can always delete a project to free up space for a new one, but keep in mind that you will lose all of the previously collected data.




Site Audit: Pages to Crawl

The number of pages your Site Audit can crawl throughout all of your projects is limited by your account. Each package comes with a total number of pages that a user can crawl per month. Here are the limits by subscription:


Plans & Prices

The Maximum number of pages that can be crawled in a single audit:


	Free: 100
	Pro: 20,000
	Guru: 20,000
	Business: 100,000


Pages to crawl do not roll over each month; however, they reset on the 1st of the month.

Once you use up your total amount for the month, you would either need to wait until next month for your limits to be reset, expand your limits, or upgrade your account to receive more pages. When conducting your Site Audit campaigns, you will want to keep this in mind so you don’t waste your limits.




Site Audit: AMP Checks


Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) is a Google-backed technology designed to improve the performance of mobile websites. An AMP version of a website loads three times faster from the search engine than a non-AMP version, but it places strict restrictions on CSS, Javascript, and HTML usage. Mistakes during AMP implementation are very common, so Semrush Site Audit offers to check the websites of our Business subscribers for over 40 AMP-related issues.

Since page load speed has a great influence on user experience and is a ranking factor for Google, you can see why AMP has become an important platform for e-commerce and advertising.




Position Tracking

Just like the other tools within our Projects interface, our Position Tracking tool also has subscription limitations. These limitations come in the form of keywords:



Plans & Prices

You will also want to keep these limits in mind when reporting. If you ever run out of keywords, you can always remove individual keywords, remove any projects, buy more keywords, or upgrade your account.

Cannibalization Report is included in the Guru or higher subscription plans. It allows you to detect the pages that compete for the same keywords and search rankings and lose positions due to this competition.

Multi-targeting is available to our users with a Guru or higher subscription plan and allows users to gather rank-tracking data for multiple devices and locations simultaneously within the same project (for example, Desktop vs. Mobile).

Please note: When you add another location or device to your campaign, your account is charged separately for the keywords in the second location.

So, a Project tracking the same 10 keywords in 3 different locations costs 30 keywords from your account limits.




On Page SEO Checker

On Page SEO Checker allows you to pair landing pages with sets of keywords to get recommendations for search engine optimization.



Plans & Prices

If you want optimization ideas for 100 keywords 10 times a month, you will be spending 1,000 SEO ideas units. Your limit refreshes each month on the 1st of the month.

Please keep in mind that this tool shares its limit of keywords (labeled as SEO Ideas units on your Subscription Info page) with SEO Writing Assistant and SEO Content Template. Every target keyword you enter into one of those tools will also count against the same pool of limits (10 for a Free account, 500 for a Pro account, and so on). More info on SEO Ideas units can be found here. 




Semrush Social

If you work with social media, you must know how hard it can be to track and analyze the results of your activities while also keeping an eye on all your competitors. Another big and time-consuming part of a social media specialist’s workflow is managing accounts, scheduling, and posting to different social networks.

To relieve you from these issues, Semrush designed a special App – Semrush Social that consists of four tools:

	Tracker that allows you to track the social media accounts of your closest competitors and compare their growth and engagement levels to yours. 
	Poster that offers an easy way to draft, schedule, and post content on Facebook (Business pages), LinkedIn, Instagram, Google Business Profile, Pinterest, and Twitter without leaving the Semrush interface.
	Analytics that allows you to see your internal analytic metrics for your Facebook, LinkedIn, and Instagram channels. 
	Content Insights is a simple dashboard that shows key stats about your social media performance. You can see the number of posts, engagement metrics (likes, comments, etc.), and best-performing tags/content types for your selected date range.


Semrush Social is available for an additional $29.99/month, and the limits in each tool will depend on the level of your subscription:


	
		
			 
			
			 Social Subscription
			
			 Pro subscription
			Guru subscription
			Business subscription
		
		
			Projects
			1
			5
			15
			40
		
		
			Poster limits*
			
			10

			owned social profiles to post
			
			
			10

			owned social profiles to post
			
			
			30

			owned social profiles to post
			
			
			50

			owned social profiles to post
			
		
		
			Tracker limits
			
			50

			social profiles to track
			
			
			50

			social profiles to track
			
			
			100

			social profiles to track
			
			
			300

			social profiles to track
			
		
	


*Additional features for Poster are:


	UTM builder
	Bitly Shortener
	Giphy
	RSS feeds
	Image Editor
	Bulk Scheduling
	Video posting (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn)


Supported channels for Poster: 


	Facebook
	Instagram
	Twitter
	LinkedIn
	Pinterest


Supported channels for Tracker:


	Facebook
	Instagram
	Twitter
	YouTube 
	Pinterest


Projects refer to the number of campaigns you create: 1 project – 1 website to post and/or track competitors for.

Owned social profiles are the social accounts you can connect to Semrush in order to post across different social networks from a single tab. 

For example, let’s say you have three Projects with Social Poster running, and in each Project, you have Facebook, Twitter, and Pinterest connected for posting. This would cost you nine profiles (three connected profiles in three Projects). 

Social profiles to track are the profiles of your brand and your competitors you are tracking within your Tracker Project.

Let's say you have created a Social Tracker project in which you are only tracking Facebook and Twitter. If you were to add two competitors who both have Facebook and Twitter, you would have used up six profiles. 

Each competitor would have two profiles, along with the two profiles you added for your own domain, to give you a total of six profiles.

In addition to Semrush Social subscription, you can purchase Social Content AI for $29.99/month. 

Social Content AI is an AI-powered tool that generates strong content ideas across a variety of topics and helps create that content for specific social media networks. With this tool, you can effortlessly brainstorm ideas, generate your post with your unique visuals, and plan your content in minutes.




Content Marketing Platform


Semrush offers multiple tools for content marketing. In addition to optimizing your content and tracking its performance, you can use SEO Content Template for creating SEO-friendly content from scratch. 

*Note: all tools in our Content Marketing Platform are only available in full with a Guru or Business level subscription*



	
		
			 
			
			Free
			
			
			Pro
			
			
			Guru
			
			
			Business
			
		
		
			
			Topic Research
			
			
			2 queries 
			
			
			2 queries
			
			
			unlimited 
			
			
			unlimited
			
		
		
			
			SEO Ideas Units*
			
			
			10
			
			
			500
			
			
			800
			
			
			2000
			
		
		
			
			SEO Content Template

			(uses SEO Ideas Units)
			
			
			1 template, 10 keywords per template max
			
			
			1 template, 30 keywords per template max
			
			
			unlimited templates, 30 keywords per template max
			
			
			unlimited templates, 30 keywords per template max
			
		
		
			
			SEO Writing Assistant
			
			
			2 documents for a lifetime of your account, SEO and Readability checks
			
			 
			
			2 documents, SEO, Readability and Tone of Voice checks,  3 Plagiarism checks, 500 Smart Writer Words for a lifetime of your account
			
			
			unlimited number of documents, SEO, Readability and Tone of Voice checks, 5 Plagiarism checks, 1000 Smart Writer Words per month
			
			
			unlimited number of documents, SEO, Readability and Tone of Voice checks, 10 Plagiarism checks, 2000 Smart Writer Words per month
			
		
	




*SEO Ideas Units are distributed between SEO Content Template and On Page SEO Checker. 1 unit = 1 keyword you can add to a content template or On Page SEO Checker campaign.

More info on SEO Ideas units can be found here. 

Topic Research is a smart tool for content ideation in a creative and informed way, but please note that Free users and users on Pro will only be able to use it twice. Guru and Business users have unlimited access to topics. 

SEO Content Template analyzes your top competitors for your target keywords and provides you with recommendations for creating winning content. While with a Free you can create 1 template with 10 keywords, Pro accounts are upgraded slightly with 1 template with 30 keywords.

On a Guru and Business, you get unlimited templates with 30 keywords per template. However, each account level takes these keywords from your SEO Ideas limits. This means that the maximum possible number of keywords on Free is 10, Pro 500, Guru is 800, and on Business it's 2,000. 

SEO Writing Assistant is a Google Docs and MS Word add-on that integrates recommendations in your Google Docs or MS Word (it also functions as a WordPress plugin). With a Free account, you get 2 documents, SEO and Readability checks. With a Pro subscription, you also get 2 documents, as well as SEO, Readability, and Tone of Voice checks, 3 plagiarism checks, and 500 Smart Writer Words for a Rephraser feature. Guru and Business give you an unlimited number of documents, SEO, Readability, and Tone of Voice checks, additional plagiarism checks (5 and 10), and a Rephraser feature with 1000 and 2000 Smart Writer Words respectively per month.

Plans & Prices




PPC Keyword Tool

PPC Keyword Tool makes the job of a PPC specialist much easier by simplifying the planning and setting up of Google Ads campaigns. With this tool, you can organize keywords into ad groups and campaigns, receive local volume and CPC data, quickly set up negative keywords, and export a campaign plan to import directly into Google Ads.

The number of keywords you can export with CPC and volume data is limited by your subscription:



Please note: you can export as many keywords as you have in a PPC Keyword Tool campaign. However, you will only be able to export CPC and volume data for the amount available with your plan. For example, a Pro account could export a PPC Keyword Tool list with 600 keywords, but only the first 500 (based on campaign and alphabetical order) would have CPC and Volume data. The remaining 100 would just be exported as keywords without any further metrics.

Plans & Prices




Keyword Magic Tool

The Keyword Magic Tool is the most powerful keyword research tool on Semrush. Keyword Magic is wonderful for exploring different niche topics, finding useful long-tail keywords, and streamlining your keyword research process.

The limits for the Keyword Magic Tool are as follows:

Reports per day


	
	Free - 10
	
	
	Pro - 3000
	
	
	Guru - 5000
	
	
	Business - 10000
	




Results per report


	
	Free - 10 in the user interface, 0 in export
	
	
	Pro - 10000
	
	
	Guru - 30000
	
	
	Business - 50000
	




Reports per hour


	
	Free - 10 per hour
	
	
	Pro - 100
	
	
	Guru - 100
	
	
	Business - 100
	


Number of total keywords you can add to Keyword Strategy Builder in all of your lists:


	All subscriptions: 100,000 keywords


Number of times you can cluster a list in Keyword Strategy Builder per month:


	Free - 0 times
	Pro - 10 times
	Guru - 30 times
	Business - 50 times


Keyword Strategy Builder (Refresh Keywords per month)


	
	Free - 0
	
	
	Pro - 250
	
	
	Guru - 1000
	
	
	Business - 5000
	


List sharing limits:


	All paid users can share lists with Editor access with other paid users.
	All paid users can share lists with Viewer access with all users (including Free users).
	Free users cannot share Keyword Strategy Builder Lists.





PDF Reports (Scheduled and Branded)

The PDF limitations within your Semrush account refer to your capabilities within the My Reports section. Every account has the ability to create as many PDF reports as they wish. However, depending on your account, you can only schedule a number of reports.

Here are the limitations for scheduling your reports by package:


Semrush also offers extended branding and customization options for your reports as part of the Agency Growth Kit add-on, such as:


	Branded reports: reports with a header that include both a logo and a brief description of your brand instead of the standard Semrush logo in the header.
	White-labeled reports: The “The report data taken from semrush.com” phrase will be removed, Semrush will not be marked as a sender, and you will be able to customize the email text when scheduling or sending the report.
	Custom themes: a set of backgrounds for your reports.
	Custom visual styles: various color schemes and font sets to choose from.


Plans & Prices




Product Listing Ads (PLA) Research


Product Listing Ads (PLA) are displayed when someone searches on Google for a product that has a listing on Google Shopping. This type of ad is more intent-oriented and has a much higher conversion rate than the regular ad snippets. Therefore, serious e-commerce should pay close attention to the PLAs.

With a Free, Pro, or Guru account, you will be limited to only 10 rows of results when you query a report in this tool.

With a Business account, you will have full access to PLA Research reports. These reports include a PLA Positions report, Competitors report, and Copies report (for seeing your competitors’ actual PLAs).




API Access


Application Programming Interface (API) is a way of receiving raw Semrush data without navigating into Semrush itself.

The Standard API includes Analytics API and Projects API (Site Audit and Position Tracking data). This feature is only available to our Business subscribers.

Semrush users can also access the .Trends API (Basic or Premium) that allows to pull the data for up to 5 domains in a single request. 


	.Trends Basic API:  Offers access to broad traffic summaries that include website traffic metrics and user behavior data
	.Trends Premium API: Offers everything included in the .Trends Basic API, along with 16 additional data types that allow you to dig deeper into market dynamics, competitor strategies, and web traffic flows 


If you would like to know more about the pricing of API access/API units, we suggest referring to this article or reaching out to our sales team.




Agency Growth Kit


Access to any Agency Growth Kit add-on can be added to paid Semrush subscription plans.


	
		
			 
			
			Semrush Pro ($139.95/mo)
			
			Semrush Guru ($249.95/mo)
			Semrush Business ($499.95/mo)
		
		
			AGK Start ($69/mo)
			✔️ $208.95/mo
			❌
			❌
		
		
			AGK Scale ($149/mo)
			✔️ $288.95/mo
			✔️ $398.95/mo
			❌
		
		
			AGK Advanced ($249/mo)
			✔️ $388.95/mo
			✔️ $498.95/mo
			✔️ $748.95/mo
		
	


Any Agency Growth Kit plan lets you:


	Create white-label and branded reports (the number of available reports depends on your subscription);
	Use themes for reports and customize their visual style;
	Create client profiles in the CRM;
	Create interactive and secure portals in Client Portal;
	Get an Agency Partners Platform listing and Semrush Partner status after being certified as a Semrush Agency Partner.




Try Semrush for free

Check your limits on your Subscription Info page. If you are interested in extending your subscription, you can reach out to sales@semrush.com.

By understanding your account's features and capabilities, you will have a stronger hold on the data we offer. You can use Semrush for free with limited functionality or use a free 7-day trial to test out the tools. The platform will automatically offer the trial to you, but if you would like to use Semrush for free or save it for later, you can skip this step:



Alternatively, you can choose one of the three main plans from the start: Pro, Guru, and Business. Please find the pricing for each plan here. 

If none of these plans fits your marketing needs, contact us to create a flexible custom plan.

mediaOptimization.alt: Semrush Domain Analytics and Keyword Analytics: requests and results. Free plan: no filters available, 10 results per request, 10 requests a day. Pro plan: 10000 results per request, 3000 requests a day. Guru plan: historical data, 30000 results per request, 5000 requests a day. Business plan: historical data, PLA, 50000 results per request, 10000 requests a day.
Semrush subscription without .Trends requests per day. Free plans: 10 requests per day. Pro plans: 3000 requests per day. Guru plans: 5000 requests per day. Business plans: 10000 requests per day.
Semrush subscription with .Trends requests per day. Pro plans: 3000 requests per day. Guru plans: 5000 requests per day. Business plans: 10000 requests per day.

Project limits in Semrush. Free plan: No sharing for edit, 1 Project. Pro plan: 5 Projects at a time. Guru plan: multi-targeting in Position Tracking, 15 Projects at a time. Business plan: multi-targeting in Position Tracking, AMP checks in Site Audit, 40 Projects at a time.
Site Audit Pages to Crawl limits. Free plan: 100 pages per month. Pro plan: 100,000 pages per month. Guru plan: 300,000 pages per month. Business plan: 1,000,000 pages per month and AMP checks.

Semrush Position Tracking: keywords to track limits. Free plan: 10 keywords in 1 Project. Pro plan: 500 keywords amongst your 5 Projects. Guru: 1500 keywords amongst 15 Projects. Business plan: 5000 keywords amongst 40 Projects.
Semrush On Page SEO Checker. Free plan: single use, 10 keywords. Pro plan: 500 keywords per month. Guru: 800 keywords per month. Business plan: 2000 keywords per month.

Semrush PPC Keyword Tool: export limits. Free plan: No CPC or volume data. Pro plan: 500 keywords with CPC and volume data. Guru plan: 1500 keywords with CPC and volume data. Business plan: 6000 keywords with CPC and volume data.
Semrush Keyword Magic Tool limits: reports per day. Free plan - 10, Pro - 3000, Guru - 5000, Business - 10000.
Semrush Keyword Magic Tool limits: Results per report. Free - 10 in the user interface, 0 in export, Pro - 10000, Guru - 30000, Business - 50000.
Scheduled PDF Reports. Free plan: 1 report. Pro plan: 5 reports. Guru plan: 20 reports. Business plan: 50 reports.
7-day trial pop-up showing Pro and Guru subscriptions.
